instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3208 bios
threads.message: Does anyone have a BIOS file for an 820-3208? I have a board stuck at the booting screen. Slowly boots and gets stuck at the Apple. No spill damage that I can see. Not sure what else it could be.

threads.title: 820-3208 bios
threads.message: Try this one, backup your old!

threads.title: 820-3208 bios
threads.message: That one is coming up as BIOS locked. Just to make sure I wrote the original unedited file from above to my chip and it came up locked also. I wrote the computer's original file back on there and it's back to the super-slow progress bar.

threads.title: 820-3208 bios
threads.message: Oops, upload your original or just cut and past the ME region from this one over yours, ME is 0x0 to 0x190000

threads.title: 820-3208 bios
threads.message: Ok, I copied the ME over. Thanks a lot for your help.

threads.title: 820-3208 bios
threads.message: I don't know anything about the BIOS or SPI can anyone point me to right direction with tutorials ans software? Thank you

threads.message: I have the same problem.I would like to join to request...
